attributes.action: Reopen the NHS Nightingale hospitals to deal with the backlog
attributes.additional_details: England's hospitals are struggling with a backlog
attributes.background: Reopen the NHS Nightingale hospitals to deal with the backlog

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on how to use the Nightingale hospitals are an operational decision for the NHS, Clinical Commissioning Groups (CCGs) and individual trusts.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to improve NHS and ambulance services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607465
